participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Emily loves sharing her passions with others, particularly music and sports.
participant_1.background: I enjoy playing music and interacting with my listeners. I have two kids I enjoy being on social media. I spent most of my summer last year playing hockey. I'd love to show off my gummy worm collection to my friends if I was famous. I am a true believer in God first.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is introspective yet adventurous, often finding joy in music and sports while managing his challenges.
participant_2.background: My biggest fear is that I will never be able to overcome my anxiety and live a normal life. I play for the Washington Wizards. I went to a local metal show for my last birthday. I live in Japan and own the biggest mansion in the country. I play the drums.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Good! Just got back from a metal show. How about you?
I am doing well. Just finished playing hockey.
Oh cool! Do you play on a team?
Yeah I play for the local high school team.
That's awesome! I play drums for the Washington Wizards.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to go to a basketball game.
You should come to one of our games sometime!
Great! I'll give you my number so you can text me when you're free.
